title: ♦ SUNNY SPACIOUS TOP FLOOR 2 BED + OFFICE NEAR SULLIVAN SQ T!
posting_body: ['SUNNY SPACIOUS TOP FLOOR 2 BED + OFFICE NEAR', 'SULLIVAN SQ T!', ' - $2,400 per month', '89 Cross Street, Somerville, MA 02145', 'FEATURES', 'Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Located on Floor #:', '3', 'Floors in Bldg:', '3', 'Pets Allowed:', 'None', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Located in East Somerville, conveniently located near the Sullivan Square Orange Line T, and easy access to trendy Assembly Row, this sunny, very spacious, 2 bedroom apartment features hardwood floors, separate living room, dining room, and office.', 'Modern eat in kitchen including dishwasher, gas stove, disposal and pantry.', 'Laundry is on the premises.', 'Available 9/1/2022.', '*** NOTE: LANDLORD WILL BE REPAINTING THE UNIT, REFINISHING THE HARDWOOD FLOORS, AND REPLACING WINDOW BLINDS DURING THE MONTH OF AUGUST AS THE VACATING TENANT HAS OCCUPIED THE APARTMENT FOR A LONG TIME.', 'PICTURES SHOW TENANT HAS BEEN USING THE LIVING ROOM AS A BEDROOM.', '***', 'RENTAL UNIT AMENITIES', 'Refrigerator', 'Dishwasher', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Eat in Kitchen', 'Office', 'Dining Room', 'BUILDING AMENITIES', 'On-site Laundry', 'OTHER PRICING DETAILS', 'Available Date:   Thu Sep 01, 2022', 'CONTACT INFO', 'Roy Seidenberg', '617-628-4663 x100', 'Boston Rental Exchange', 'brex10-ry']
